snakesandladders

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • snakesandladders.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    This class initializes all the squares from 1 to 100(inclusive). All members of this class are static as an object of this class is not created.
    Author:
    Shantanu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.Integer ladders
      The number of ladders on the board.
      (package private) static java.util.Random rnd
      Object of Random which is reused throughout the class.
      static java.lang.Integer snakes
      The number of snakes on the board.
      static Square[] squares
      The array which contains the squares.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void initialiseSnL()
      This method simulates the functionality of snakes and ladders on the board.
      static void initialiseSquares()
      This method initializes the squares from 1 through 100 using nested for loops.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • squares

        public static Square[] squares
        The array which contains the squares. It is given a size of 101 so as to conveniently start using indices 1 through 100.

      • snakes

        public static java.lang.Integer snakes
        The number of snakes on the board. By default, this value is set to 2.

      • ladders

        public static java.lang.Integer ladders
        The number of ladders on the board. By default, this value is set to 2.

      • rnd

        static java.util.Random rnd
        Object of Random which is reused throughout the class.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board()

    • Method Detail

      • initialiseSquares

        public static void initialiseSquares()
        This method initializes the squares from 1 through 100 using nested for loops. It also assigns them their grid coordinates.

      • initialiseSnL

        public static void initialiseSnL()
        This method simulates the functionality of snakes and ladders on the board. This is done by using a Random generator and running multiple checks to ensure that no overlap takes place. The method changes the Square.DestSquare attribute of the randomly selected squares.
